turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to get some pizzas from Bella Luna. Can you help me order them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: from Bella Luna, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, How many pizza would you like to order today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well we're going to need four large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok 4 large pizzas, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get one with Ann Chovy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then I want one just plain pepperoni, like just a classic. And then for the other one, I want feta and olives. And for the last one, can you just make that one like meat lover's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anchovy, plan pepperoni, feta with olives and meat lovers is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat that one more time?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anchovy, plan pepperoni, feta with olives and meat lovers. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that sounds right. Can you make it Can you make it extra cheese on the feta and olive pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: extra cheese on feta with olives pizza. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me confirm your orders for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, go for it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that's 4 large pizza, anchovy, plan pepperoni, feta with olives and meat lovers.extra cheese on feta with olives pizza is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whoa whoa whoa, slow down a little bit. Just can you repeat it one more time for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course, so thats 4 large pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anchovy, plan pepperoni, feta with olives and meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: extra cheese on feta with olives pizza. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok wonderful, let me get your totals for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your total for 4 large pizza comes to 100 dollars tax and ordering fees included is that ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. That's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thanks a lot. No. That'll cover it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a good day.
